comments.en:
Remember that the 5L is more like the LaserJet 4 family than the LaserJet 5 family (as with most "L" printers from HP). For example it does not work with the "lj5gray"/"lj5mono" drivers but only with the "ljet4"/"lj4dith" drivers (and GIMP-Print).

Getting more RAM is highly recommended; with only the standard 1Meg you may be unable to print some jobs.

When printing text from the command line the 1st line of the first page is only half visible; also column 77 is the last column to be fully printed. Sophisticated applications that use wide margins all-around print fine.
